title: The Starry Night
description: The Starry Night is one of Van Gogh's most famous masterpieces, known for its swirling clouds and bright stars.

title: Guernica
description: Guernica is a powerful anti-war painting created by Picasso during the Spanish Civil War.

title: Mona Lisa
description: The Mona Lisa is perhaps the most famous portrait in the world, known for its enigmatic smile.

title: The Persistence of Memory
description: This surrealist masterpiece features melting clocks draped over various objects.

title: The Scream
description: The Scream depicts a figure with an agonized expression against a swirling sky.

title: The Night Watch
description: The Night Watch is a famous group portrait by Rembrandt, known for its use of light and shadow.

title: Les Demoiselles d'Avignon
description: This groundbreaking painting by Picasso depicts five nude women in a brothel setting.

title: The Last Supper
description: The Last Supper is a famous religious painting depicting the scene of Jesus' last meal with his disciples.

title: Water Lilies
description: Water Lilies is a series of Impressionist paintings by Monet, capturing the beauty of his garden pond.

title: The Birth of Venus
description: This iconic Renaissance painting depicts the goddess Venus emerging from the sea.
